Reviews.Title: “Very Good Location!!!”
Reviews.Author: Lucypayne03
Reviews.Content: recently visited gran ronda hotel school trip found value money hotel situated location 510 minute walk las ramblas nearest metro hotel self clean modern offered facilities beds comfortable offered airconditioning heating impressions nice found receptionist little rude able check allowed straight explore city visit hotel recommend looking hotel location hotel suitable short stay metro runs underneath hotel till late night sleep

Reviews.Title: “Weekend Break”
Reviews.Author: Barry J Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel metro 10minute walk la rambla food markets theres supermarket hotel nibbles stuff lunch staying try stay 4th ot 5th floor metro goes underneath dont cant overall weekend complaints hotel

Reviews.Title: “Value for money!very good location!!”
Reviews.Author: gfmari
Reviews.Content: location near center las triple little didnt bother nice bathroomit clean staff helpfulwe noise facing amount money hotel perfect

Reviews.Title: “Great central hotel”
Reviews.Author: BrynnaV
Reviews.Content: stayed gran ronda 3 nights recently surprise boyfriend id looked lots lots hotels finally decided location central walking metro 2 minutes road decent size middle bustling city dont expect huge hotel floor hear street noise cleaned daily breakfast kept hours staff friendly helpful 5 star hotel ideal city break spend time recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very good for young travelers”
Reviews.Author: SalahK_12
Reviews.Content: stayed gran ronda hotel 3 nights stayed floor window facing street hotel clean day clean left beds fine staff help lot faced answer question guide near super market restaurants location walk distance plaza catalonia center barcelona near l2 l1 metro station neighborhood safe quit night breakfast basic hand guess hotel bad light sleeper double glass window reduce sound feel hear metro underneath hear night buses stops traffic light 4th 5th floor overall

Reviews.Title: “Good clean City Centre Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Chris H
Reviews.Content: hotel situated easy walking distance city centre clean staff helpful polite clean functional downside hotel situated metro trains heard throughout night slept complaints recommend breakfast option lots choose fresh coffee fresh stay

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel - Would stay again”
Reviews.Author: lisa26186
Reviews.Content: mum arrived barcelona venice taking aerobus placa universitat found hotel 5 minutes walking distance miss entrance hotel looking hotel staff pleasant hotel modern clean 1st floor balcony leave door streets noisy kept closed hardly hear noise streets feel building shake train goes hotel dint overly annoying clean space anticipated hotel slightly tourist wander night day fine walk la rambla metro stop corner metro barcelona breakfast enter hotel hrs via magnetic card found reassuring overly priced 3 start round stay hotel recommend

Reviews.Title: “nice stay at the Gran Ronda Hotel, BCN”
Reviews.Author: Dana182
Reviews.Content: spent 6 nights gran ronda hotel barcelona september 2011 stayed 5th floor facing hotel street location close public transportation foot main attractions quiet clean 3 supermarkets close cute cafes clean quiet comfortable price bit 3 star hotel la merce festival hotels booked satisfied didnt breakfast included cant comment subject

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Boshardt
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 5 nights stay barcelona hotel slightly main tourist – 12 minute easy walk las ramblas subway station 100m hotel discovered water dripping ceiling bathroom spoke receptionist offered 2 half size currently promised fixed day fixed opted stay fairly spacious desk chair table luggage reception staffs friendly helpful providing information city noise

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: PaulHutton_Macdonald
Reviews.Content: arrived late monday evening hotel checked resembled site internal window overlooking atrium runs lobby top floor hotels site makes remarkable feature isnt serves carry noise slightest movement lobby coupled lot movement outside hard bed meant didnt sleep 6am thats mention noise metro passing underneath hotel real rate complained morning manager duty oblige offer complimentary breakfast wasnt bad 3 property assigned nonsmoking failed specify booking engine section missed partly mistake stank guy front desk help getting air freshener floor smoking avoid floor youre nonsmoker location raval leixample staff pretty friendly wouldnt personally book noted whilst paid 100eur easter weekend charging nearly standard outrageous

Reviews.Title: “small rooms, very hard beds”
Reviews.Author: Exu
Reviews.Content: disappointed hotel standard actually window location ok staff friendly move night bed hard sleeping floor theres noice vibration coming tube

Reviews.Title: “Perfect stay”
Reviews.Author: alleshha
Reviews.Content: boyfriend spent 3 nights hotel choice hotel central shops cafes corner la rambla bouqueria market lot walking distance hotel staff friendly helpful nice clean enjoyed balcony strongly recommend choose barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel, Great location, Wonderful staff, Small rooms”
Reviews.Author: SivanMer
Reviews.Content: 2 friends stayed hotel 4 nights 21 nov till 25 nov 2010 excellent hotel staff realy location 3 min walk plaza catalonia max 10 min walk la rambla clean hotel hotels staff wounderful helpfull mirrors except lil mirror bathroom breakfast excellent varied value sometimes fill lil bit metro trains barely sensed enjoyed stay definitely hotel recomend

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and value”
Reviews.Author: cocovlc
Reviews.Content: looking budget managed amazing rate 61 € night stayed 2 nights hotel excellent value location quality economy range window looking inside patio outside dark clean comfortable location central ideal walk center overall hotel looks nice modern deco friendly helpful staff probably time
